description: Takes the voxel-by-voxel mean of all input datasets; designed to be faster than 3dcalc.

verbose.title: Verbose Flag
verbose.description: Print out some information along the way

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Sets the prefix of the output dataset

datum.title: Datum
datum.description: Sets the datum of the output dataset

fscale.title: Force Scale Flag
fscale.description: Force scaling of the output to the maximum integer range

gscale.title: Global Scale Flag
gscale.description: Force scaling of the output to the maximum integer range, with uniform scaling factor for each sub-brick

nscale.title: No Scale Flag
nscale.description: Don't do any scaling on output to byte or short datasets. Only use if you want the output dataset to be integer-valued.

non_zero.title: Non-zero Values Flag
non_zero.description: Use only non-zero values for calculation of mean, min, max, sum, squares

stdev.title: Standard Deviation Flag
stdev.description: Calculate the standard deviation, sqrt(variance), instead of the mean (cannot be used with -sqr, -sum or -non_zero)

sqr.title: Average Squares Flag
sqr.description: Average the squares, instead of the values

sum.title: Sum Flag
sum.description: Just take the sum (don't divide by number of datasets)

count.title: Count Flag
count.description: Compute only the count of non-zero voxels

max.title: Max Flag
max.description: Find the maximum at each voxel

min.title: Min Flag
min.description: Find the minimum at each voxel

absmax.title: Absolute Max Flag
absmax.description: Find maximum absolute value at each voxel

signed_absmax.title: Signed Absolute Max Flag
signed_absmax.description: Find extremes with maximum absolute value but preserve sign

weightset.title: Weightset
weightset.description: Sum of N dsets will be weighted by N volume WSET. This weight dataset must be of type float.
